title: Background independent higher derivative double field theory action
abstract:
Double field theory (DFT) can be constructed from the color-kinematic double
copy of Yang-Mills theory. In a recent work, this construction has been
extended to higher-derivative terms, starting from the four-derivative
extension of Yang-Mills theory with an expectation to obtain a conformally
invariant DFT action up to the third order. Here, I attempt to extend this
higher-derivative DFT action for all orders in a manifestly
background-independent way starting from the second order terms. The third
order terms I obtained do not match the third order terms obtained directly
from the double copy map. A clear understanding of this mismatch can give
valuable information about the double copy procedure for DFT, its relation to
background independence, and the conformal symmetry in double configuration
space.
